text: Choosing the right payment gateway for your e-commerce store is like selecting the perfect spices for your Onam sadhya. You need to get it just right! There are tons of options out there, from Razorpay to CCAvenue, PayU and BillDesk, all fighting for your attention. Think about factors like transaction fees (important for keeping your profit margins healthy, especially during Diwali season!), supported payment methods (UPI is HUGE in India!), security features (nobody wants their data stolen!), and integration with your existing e-commerce platform (Shopify, WooCommerce, etc.).
